name: PathikVani
0:
”Alexa ask Pathik Vani”
”Alexa open Pathik Vani”
”Alexa play Pathik Vani”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: pathik vani
des:
Pujya Sant Shri Pathik ji Maharaj has become a supreme renouncer, a detached Mahatma. Who kept revealing himself in the world only as "Sadhu vesh me Pathik" a wanderer. His speech indicates every soul as a wanderer in the world. Sant Pathik Ji Maharaj's Bhajans and Satsang in Hindi are most heart collection for every human being who is seeking Peace, Bhakti (Devotion) and Mukti (Libration). 

Currently the content of this skill is in Hindi language however is a useful skill for global Hindi listers.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
